title: Semantik Architect  Frame Schema: Religion / Belief System / Ideology
description: JSON schema for the ReligionIdeologyFrame semantic structure used for religions, belief systems, denominations, and ideologies.

frame_type.description: Stable frame identifier; must be "entity.belief_system" for ReligionIdeologyFrame instances (frame family ID in semantics.all_frames).

main_entity.description: The religion / belief system / ideology entity this frame describes, typically mirroring semantics.types.Entity (id, name, entity_type, extra, etc.).

classification_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels for the broad class of the system (e.g. "religion", "political_ideology", "philosophical_system").

tradition_family_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels for higher-level tradition / family (e.g. "abrahamic", "dharmic", "christian", "marxist").

origin_location.description: Optional Location-like object describing where the system originated (e.g. region, city).

origin_event.description: Optional Event-like object describing emergence / founding / codification, mirroring semantics.types.Event (id, event_type, time, location, participants, properties, extra).

founder_entities.description: List of Entity-like objects representing founders or origin figures (e.g. "Gautama Buddha", "Karl Marx").

core_figures.description: List of Entity-like objects representing central figures (deities, prophets, emblematic figures) distinct from historical founders when needed.

key_belief_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels for core beliefs / themes (e.g. "monotheism", "nonviolence", "class_struggle").

primary_text_entities.description: Entity-like objects representing scriptures / canonical texts (e.g. "Bible", "Qur'an", "Communist Manifesto").

items.description: Entity-like object, typically mirroring semantics.types.Entity with entity_type indicating a work.

institutional_entities.description: Entity-like objects representing major institutions associated with the system (e.g. churches, councils, parties).

geographic_scope.description: Location-like objects representing the main regions where the system is practiced or influential (e.g. "worldwide", "South Asia").

items.description: Location-like object, typically mirroring semantics.types.Location (id, name, kind, extra, etc.).

estimated_adherents.description: Approximate number of adherents / followers, if known (e.g. total adherents worldwide).

adherent_estimate_year.description: Reference year for the adherent estimate (e.g. survey or estimate year).

parent_traditions.description: Entity-like objects representing conceptual or historical parent traditions or sources.

derived_traditions.description: Entity-like objects representing derived traditions, denominations, or ideologies that grow out of this system.

branches.description: Entity-like objects representing major internal branches / denominations considered part of the same umbrella belief system.

attributes.description: Open-ended attribute map for additional structured facts (e.g. sacred_languages, organizational_structure, major_festivals). Keys should be strings.

extra.description: Free-form metadata bag for provenance, debug info, or original-source fields that are not directly interpreted by NLG.
